title: Rewards wallet
description: A wallet that stores ada which can be used in stake delegation. The stake from a single Rewards wallet can only be delegated to a single stake pool.
aliases: cardano stake pool operator rewards wallet
cardano stake pool owner rewards wallets

props.body: To delegate to more than one stake pool, you will need to create multiple Rewards wallets and distribute ada among them.
